definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: This design is of high practical value and has broad applicative prospects.
sentences.chinese: 该设计具有较高的实用价值和广阔的应用前景。

sentences.english: The utility model is the dust-proof cover for chimneys with practicability.
sentences.chinese: 是一种很具有实用价值的烟囱防尘罩。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the usefulness of multiple RF needle electrodes in the treatment of hepatic cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价多弹头集束射频治疗肝癌的实用价值。

sentences.english: Exemplification results showed that this method is good at evaluation effectiveness and practicality.
sentences.chinese: 实例证明该方法具有良好的评价效果和实用价值。

sentences.english: Therefore, research in UF membrane technology has great significance of theoretical and practical values.
sentences.chinese: 因此，对超滤膜的研究有着重大的理论和实用价值。

sentences.english: The results from numerical example show that this method is effective and practical value for engineering aplication.
sentences.chinese: 算例表明方法的可行性和工程实用价值。

sentences.english: Meanwhile it describes the utility value of regenerated BIIR.
sentences.chinese: 同时，文中还论述了溴化丁基再生胶的实用价值。

sentences.english: It is convient in the middle or small control system.
sentences.chinese: 该方法简单实用，在中小型系统中有较好的实用价值。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the practical value of repairing the defects of calvarial with tissue engineering technique.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨组织工程化骨修复骨缺损实用价值。

sentences.english: The result proves that Jerusalem artichoke can be a new crop for su-gar source of practical value.
sentences.chinese: 这一研究证明，它是一种很有实用价值的新糖料植物。

sentences.english: Experiments have indicated that the system has due practi…
sentences.chinese: 实验证明该系统对液晶材料测试具有一定实用价值。

sentences.english: The system presented in the paper provides high utility value and wide applica…
sentences.chinese: 本系统有着很高的实用价值和广阔的应用前景。

sentences.english: It is of course available for the estimation on a single radar combat efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 对单部雷达的作战效能评估具有实用价值。

sentences.english: With its considerably practical value, it was well respected by medical practitioners after the publishment.
sentences.chinese: 颇具实用价值，刊行后深受医者推崇。

sentences.english: The application has great-applied value on modifying dimension text.
sentences.chinese: 该应用程序对提高尺寸文本的修改效率具有实用价值。

sentences.english: Our country has sent up another bread-and-butter satellite.
sentences.chinese: 我国又发射了一颗具有实用价值的卫星。
